```{r include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
options("kableExtra.html.bsTable" = T)
kable_pretty <- function(data) {
  kable(data, "html") %>%
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "condensed", full_width=T, position = "center"), full_width=F)
}
```
